SEARCH
Package Add_card

Class BankAccManager

java.lang.Object
Add_card.BankAccManager
public class BankAccManager extends Object
Manages the creation and validation of bank accounts for users. This class provides methods to create new accounts and validate existing ones.

  • Constructor Details

    • BankAccManager

      public BankAccManager()

  • Method Details

    • createAccount

      public BankAccount createAccount(User user, Bank bank, CardInfo cardInfo)
      Creates a new bank account for a user with the specified bank and card information.
      Parameters:
      user - the user who will own the new bank account
      bank - the bank associated with the new account
      cardInfo - the card information for the account
      Returns:
      the newly created BankAccount

    • validateAccount

      public boolean validateAccount(BankAccount account)
      Validates a bank account to ensure it has a valid user, bank, and card information. A valid account must have a non-null user, a non-null bank, and valid card information.
      Parameters:
      account - the BankAccount to validate
      Returns:
      true if the account is valid, false otherwise
